Karen Villeda (amụrụ ya na afọ 1985) bo bu onye odee, onye na-ede uri na onye na-ese ihe dijitalụ Mexico
A mụrụ Villeda na Tlaxcala, Mexico na afọ 1985
Ọ malitere ide ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ 9, wee bipụta abụ mbụ ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ mpaghara mgbe ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ edemede mgbe ọ dị afọ 16
O bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya nke abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 18, ma mụọ International Affairs na Monterrey Institute of Technology and Higher Education
Mmasị ya na uri na njikọ ya na akụrụngwa teknụzụ dị iche iche malitere site na LABO: Laboratory of cyberpoetry (www.labo.com.mx).
Asụgharịla abụ ya n'ọtụtụ asụsụ, gụnyere Arabic, Bekee, French, German na Portuguese
Ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ede uri bụ akụkụ nke Archive of Hispanic Literature on Tape of the Library of Congress (2015)  na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị edemede Mexico ole na ole na ebe nchekwa
Akụkụ nke ọrụ dijitalụ ya dị na mpịakọta nke atọ nke mkpokọta akwụkwọ eletrọnịkị nke Massachusetts Institute of Technology
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Este País
Na 2015, ọ ghọrọ onye ọdịda ọdịda nke International Writing Programme (IWP) na Mahadum nke Iowa, wee họrọ ya dị ka IWP Outreach Fellow
Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya POETronicA gụnyere ọrụ na-agụnye hypertext, visuals, na vidiyo
Ya na Denise Audirac na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji mepụta ọrụ 2014 POETuitéame, nke na-agụnye ma na-emegharị ọdịnaya site na Twitter

N'afọ 2016, Rachel Rose nke The Fiddlehead dere "ihe odide ya na-egosi na ọ bụ onye na-akwado ikike ụmụaka, karịsịa ụmụaka ndị hapụrụ Mexico ma kwaga n'ebe ugwu, na US, na-ebute ọdachi nke asụsụ, mmekọrịta ọha na eze na mpaghara obodo na ha

Na nyochaa Visegrado maka Okwu na-enweghị Borders, Charlotte Whittle na-ede, sị, "Villeda na-ezere ihe ọ bụla, na-ezigara anyị akwụkwọ ozi akwụkwọ ozi nke ihe ndị a na-ahụ anya dị oke egwu ka ọ na-awagharị n'ókèala ọ họọrọ, na-ebu ibu nke ụlọ n'ime akpa ya
Villeda's “micro-essays” mebere ederede ngwakọ n'ezie nke bụ akwụkwọ ndetu njem ozugbo, nkatọ agụmagụ na uri prose.”

Daniel Escandell Montiel na-ede na Literatura Mexicana, " POETronicA bụ ọrụ weebụ nke na-ejikọta ihe okike uri nke Villeda nke na-agafe akwụkwọ na, n'ime ya, POETuitéame bụ oge mgbanwe nke na-emepe ụzọ nke onye edemede na-ede uri nke nwa amaala, n'ụzọ megidere ya
ruo na ederede ndị bu ụzọ, nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ, dabere na ma ọ bụ sitere na nchịkọta uri ọdịnala ọdịnala (ya bụ, e bipụtara), nke onye odee sitere na Tlaxcala

Ọ bụrụ na a kọwara Villeda na profaịlụ dị ka nke dị na Encyclopedia of Literature na Mexico dị ka "onye na-ede uri na onye na-ese ihe" (2011), o doro anya na POETuitéame abụrụla ihe dị mkpa iji kwalite ibu mba ụwa dị ka onye na-ese ihe dijitalụ
